com.cvlcondorcet.condor

Class SyncingFragment

  • java.lang.Object
    • android.support.v4.app.Fragment
      • com.cvlcondorcet.condor.SyncingFragment
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    android.content.ComponentCallbacks, android.view.View.OnCreateContextMenuListener

    public class SyncingFragment
extends android.support.v4.app.Fragment
    Displays state of sync by using a BroadcastReceiver (data transmitted from Sync)
    Author:
    Quentin DE MUYNCK
    See Also:
    Sync.displayProgress()
